`Pipfile`

[packages]
numpy = "*"
scipy = "*"
pandas = "*"
matplotlib = "*"
scikit-learn = "*"
seaborn = "*"
statsmodels = "*"
pandas-datareader = "*"
scipy-special = "*"

[dev-packages]

[requires]

[options]
python-version = "3.9"
python-implementation = "cpython"
os = "posix"

`setup.py`

from setuptools import setup, find_packages

with open("requirements.txt", "r") as f:
    requirements = f.read().splitlines()

setup(
    name="data_science_script",
    version="1.0",
    packages=find_packages(),
    install_requires=requirements,
    python_requires=">=3.9"
)
